summary: Successfully completed **Subtask 9.1: Achievement Category Grid System** and thoroughly tested it on production site. Built comprehensive achievement display system with 8 categories, 6 rarity levels, search/filter functionality, and API integration. All features working perfectly: search by text, category filtering, responsive grid/compact modes, error handling, mock/API data switching, click interactions. Next: Continue with Subtask 9.2: Progress Tracking & Animations.
current_status: Task 9: Achievement System Components in progress - Subtask 9.1 COMPLETED ✅ and tested ✅. Ready to begin Subtask 9.2: Progress Tracking & Animations. System architecture solid, frontend components functioning perfectly on cascaisfishing.com.
